1. What is XenServer?
Citrix® XenServer virtualization is hardware based virtualizor and has excellent virtual machine separation. This means more of a true dedicated server like experience for the end-users.
Xenserver is designed for efficient management of Windows and Linux virtual servers, and includes hypervisor technology that is one of the fastest and most secure server virtualization software platforms available. It supports most common operating systems, including Windows® and Linux®.

2. What is the benefits of XenServer Based VPS’s?
XenServer deploy high-performance Windows and Linux virtual machines with dedicated resource.XenServer provides a highly reliable, available and secure open source virtualization platform that offers near-native performance and best-in-class VM density.
